entries.femaleVariant: Hello, it's time for your local news. A raid on an organic meat trafficking ring, and a malaria outbreak in the Glen.
Most of the district was cut off from the world for several hours as residents could not connect to the Net, local subnets or comm systems.
The NCPD has urged calm, claiming the outage was a result of standard maintenance work.
We continue our look at local news after the break.
But first we turn to a mysterious connectivity failure in Pacifica.
